entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -36.5°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
